title: Negative Squared Latin Capital Letter P

verbs: Maneuver a vehicle into a parking space

description:
Depicted by major emoji vendors as blue square with a white letter 'P' contained within it. Most often to represent a parking space or parking lot.

As of early 2022 this emoji has frequently been used as a positive response on social media - "that's üÖøÔ∏è". This is due to an association with the song 'Pushing P' by American rapper Gunna.
apple_vendor_description: The P button emoji on Apple devices presents a distinct, tactile representation of a physical button, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading. Its smooth, rounded edges and subtle gradient suggest a satisfying press, often used to denote a 'play' function or a significant action within digital interfaces. On Apple devices, this emoji conveys a sense of control and immediate interactivity, a visual cue for starting or resuming an activity.
